name: Paladins Season Pass 2021
description:
Get Exclusive content for every new Champion, all-year long, with the Paladins Season Pass 2021!

You’ll instantly unlock cosmetics you can only get in the Season Pass: The Limited Soul-Stealer Furia Skin and Golden Gryphon Mount.

Plus, you’ll get 1500 Crystals instantly as well as a 10% bonus on ALL Crystals you purchase throughout the year!

Best of all: You’ll get the following incredible content for every new Champion as they are released in 2021.
